name: Clean my Beach
description:
The beach is full of rubbish, and beach and sea animals have gone away... Throw away as many waste items as you can, in this crazy skilled-based game! The more you clean, the more cute animals will come back and make this place magical again.

FEATURES:
- A fun slingshot gameplay
- Bring back 30 beach and sea animals
- Nothing is wasted, craft more than 20 items
- 20 achievements to unlock
- Local multi-player mode, up to 4 players

This game was made in Dakar (Senegal), with love.
